General.Name: XiaMen HongXin Electron-tech Co Ltd
General.Description: XiaMen HongXin Electron-tech Group Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of flexible printed circuit boards (FPCs) in China. The company offers thin double-sided, wearable, and fingerprint identification FPCs; rigid-flex, CCM module rigid-flex, and TP and LCD module multilayer boards; and automotive and other LCD modules. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Xiamen, China. XiaMen HongXin Electron-tech Group Co.,Ltd operates as a subsidiary of Xiamen Hongxin Development Co. Ltd.
General.Address: 19 Hongxin Electronic Industrial Park, Xiamen, China, 361101

5.Name: Mr. Qin  Song
